title: What Does Bill Gates Know That We Don’t? Tens of Millions May Die In Less Than A Year? Prophecy
text:
(Before It's News)
By Lisa Haven
“Whether it occurs by a quirk of nature or at the hand of a terrorist, epidemiologists say a fast-moving airborne pathogen could kill more than 30 million people in less than a year….And they say there is a reasonable probability the world will experience such an outbreak in the next 10 to 15 years.”
Those are the stark words of one of the prominent globalists depopulation agents himself, Bill Gates, at the Munich Security Conference held Feb. 17-19th 2017, where 450 senior world leaders gathered to discuss the ‘fate of the world.’
In the video below I delve into Bill Gates harsh words and more…
